labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The in-game overlay crashes and needs to be rebooted
data.expected_result: The users name should update in the overlay
data.short_description: In-game overlay crashes when changing nicknames of people in call
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a game with in game overlay switched on (I tested in Dota 2) - Join a call with friends - Rename one people in call from Discord Client - The overlay should crash
